data.message: Thank you Facebook.  FB has reconnected me with family and friends that I haven't shared with in 40+ years.  I reconnected with a junior/high school friend via FB and we are now happily married.  My heart is thrilled!

replies.message: What a beautiful story Pam! Thank you for sharing your memories with us.  We are happy and honored to be a part of them. Congratulations! - Jenny
congo buddy. But fb has ruined the lives of many too. But happy for you. Good luck.

congrats saunders.. happi married lyf.. u r r8 sunit..
some times it hapns bt we shud b alert aways r8..!
مساء الخير بلاقي حدا عربي يفهم علي هون
:D

Happy birthday!!! I think everybody has a story with Fb. I met my now husband 6 years ago through you and we are happily married now for almost 3 years :D <3 thanks for the happiness that you brought to our lives !.

Happy Birthday Facebook! Lots (Billions) of people love what you have brought to the world. A better way to stay connected with Family and Friends as well as giving a voice to many who would not have had one if it wasn't for the ability to reach people worldwide!! I tip my hat off to you and the entire Facebook staff and developers...... here's to another 10 years!!
happy birthday and tanx a lot facebook

I <3 fb! Thanks for letting me talk to my husband downrange on the video chat, complain to my mom in America, and connect with my fellow americans here in Italy.
Happy bday, FB.
Congratulations Pam, this is wonderful news that you have!  💐
